articles.title: Breaking Physics: How Solitons Bend Time, Space, and Rules - SciTechDaily
articles.description: If it walks like a particle, and talks like a particle… it may still not be a particle. A topological soliton is a special type of wave or dislocation that behaves like a particle: it can move around but cannot spread out and disappear like you would expect f…
articles.content: Topological solitons, integral to various natural and technological processes, are being harnessed through non-reciprocal interactions to innovate in materials science and robotics, offering new poss… [+6425 chars]

articles.title: NFL owners approve ban on swivel hip-drop tackling technique - ESPN
articles.description: NFL owners have approved a rule proposal to ban the swivel hip-drop tackle, the league announced Monday.
articles.content:
Mar 25, 2024, 11:13 AM ET
NFL owners have approved a rule proposal to ban the swivel hip-drop tackle, the league announced Monday.
